item.title: These stocks have dividends that beat the market — and the companies aren't stretching to pay out, says Bank of America
item.description: Bank of America screened for stocks in the Russell 1000 that have dividends above the market, but that aren't hard pressed to pay them.

item.title: This water purification stock is set to have a bullish breakout, according to the charts
item.description: The stock has the chance to leverage a large bullish pattern once more, as it proved it could do last year, says chart analyst Frank Cappelleri.
